mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pdd_orders( id, account_id, order_sn, goods_id, goods_name, goods_thumbnail_url, goods_quantity, goods_price, order_amount, p_id, promotion_rate, promotion_amount, order_status, order_status_desc, order_create_time, order_pay_time, order_group_success_time, order_verify_time, order_modify_at, custom_parameters, cpa_new, type, order_settle_time, auth_duo_id, batch_no, order_receive_time, group_id, fail_reason, order_id, zs_duo_id, update_time, create_time, row_version) values ( #{id},#{accountId},#{orderSn},#{goodsId},#{goodsName},#{goodsThumbnailUrl},#{goodsQuantity}, #{goodsPrice},#{orderAmount},#{pId},#{promotionRate},#{promotionAmount},#{orderStatus}, #{orderStatusDesc},#{orderCreateTime},#{orderPayTime},#{orderGroupSuccessTime}, #{orderVerifyTime},#{orderModifyAt},#{customParameters},#{cpaNew},#{type},#{orderSettleTime}, #{authDuoId},#{batchNo},#{orderReceiveTime},#{groupId},#{failReason},#{orderId},#{zsDuoId}, now(), now(),"1")
